original_text: The blessing of him that was ready to perish came upon me: and I caused the widow's heart to sing for joy.
korean_text: 망하게 된 자도 나를 위하여 복을 빌었으며 과부의 마음이 나로 말미암아 기뻐 노래하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The blessing of him that was ready to perish
sentences.korean_translation: 죽을 운명에 처한 자에게 주는 축복이

sentences.original_text: and I caused the widow's heart
